SourceString: Weakened
<b>2%</> more Damage Taken per Stack.\r\nApplication chance is reduced by Disruption Resistance.
DevComment: We don't have intensity for those values yet, so they're hardcoded

SourceString: Chill
<b>-5%</> reduced Global Speed per stack.\nDeals True Damage every second.\nApplication chance is reduced by Cold Resistance.
DevComment: We don't have intensity for those values yet, so they're hardcoded

SourceString: Bleed
Deals True Damage every second. \nApplication chance is reduced by Vitality Resistance.
Stagger
<b>-10%</> reduced Global Speed per stack.\nApplication chance is reduced by Stun Resistance.
DevComment: We don't have intensity for those values yet, so they're hardcoded

SourceString: Frozen
Frozen characters can neither Move nor use Skills
Shock
Deals True Damage every second and reduces Cast Speed.\nApplication chance is reduced by Lightning Resistance.
Plague
Deals True Damage every second.\nApplication chance is reduced by Poison Resistance.
Burn
Deals True Damage every second. \nApplication chance is reduced by Vitality Resistance.
Rooted
Rooted characters can neither Move nor use Movement Skills
Slowed
Slowed characters have reduced Movement Speed
Silenced
Silenced characters can\'t use Skills except Primary Attack and Dodge
Stunned
Stunned characters can neither Move nor use Skills
